## Matrix.multiplyToRef() method

Sets the given matrix "result" with the multiplication result of the current Matrix and the given one

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiplyToRef(other: Readonly<Matrix>, result: Matrix): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | <code>Readonly&lt;Matrix&gt;</code> | defines the second operand |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the matrix where to store the multiplication |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the current matrix
